title: Preston Sagastegui Resume
text:
Marketing Consultant, Product Management, Data Science.

isaac@applesdofall.org | My wikipedia page



Standing on the shoulders of giants


Business Analytics and Data Science




September 2020 - Present Brigham Young University, Idaho



January 2025 - Present Data Science Society, Rexburg, Idaho

Manage and optimize databases, performing data cleaning, transformation and ETL processes using SQL and Python to improve AI-driven truck routing with Ollama AI and Fleetbase
Develop and automate AI-driven workflows (Ollama LLM) with prompt engineering, enhancing predictive analytics, route optimization, and UI/UX integration for improved decision making

January 2025 - Present SubLens Independent Project, Rexburg, Idaho

• Engineering AI-powered smart glasses integrating NLP (PyTorch, OpenAI Whisper, Google Translate API) with AR text overlay achieving real-time multilingual translation with a sub-1-second latency




February 2023 - Present Freelance Digital Marketing Consulant, Hybrid

Optimized and managed ad accounts for Gameday Men’s Health & Solomon Law Group, increasing lead conversions by 30% with A/B testing, audience segmentation and automation
Automated lead management with Zapier and CRM integrations, reducing contact time by 99%
Consulted on growth strategies for 15+ businesses, managing $2k+ monthly ad budgets, optimizing campaigns, and creating data-driven content for higher engagement and ROI

February 2023 - Present General Manager, Cocomo Confections

Optimized website UX/UI and landing pages SEO, driving a 25% sales increase in 3 months
Implemented data-driven digital marketing strategies, resulting in a 94% increase in customer base
Conducted in-depth statistical analysis and created data visualizations to inform strategic business decisions improving forecasting accuracy by 25%
